description: Payfactory specializes in embedded payment facilitation (payfac) services for ISVs and SaaS companies. Our gateway-friendly platform integrates with software systems to provide seamless payment facilitation with little to no development required, allowing our partners to minimize integration costs and quickly gain a new revenue stream.
